item.title: Bus. US-93 South/US-30 West at US-93 South
item.description: Bus. US-93 South/US-30 West at US-93. Exit for US-93 South to Wells, NV. Continue straight for US-30 west to Filer and Buhl.

item.title: US-30 West/Bus. US-93 South at US-93 South
item.description: US-30 West/Bus. US-93 South at US-93. Use US-93 for Jackpot (NV) and Sun Valley.

item.title: US-30 East/Bus. US-93 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 East/Bus. US-93 South. Distance to Filer, Wells, Nev. (via US-93), and Boise.

item.title: US-30 East/Bus. US-93 South - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: US-30 East/Bus. US-93 South (Addison Ave.) - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway

item.title: US-30 West at Bus. US-93 (Addison Ave.)
item.description: US-30 West (2nd Ave. North) at Bus. US-93 (Addison Ave.) in Twin Falls. Merge left for US-30 West and Bus. US-93 South to Filter and Buhl.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching Bus. US-93 (Addison Ave.)
item.description: US-30 West (2nd Ave. North) approaching Bus. US-93 (Addison Ave.) in Twin Falls. Merge left for US-30 West and Bus. US-93 South.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching (Bus.) US-93
item.description: US-30 West (2nd Ave. N) Approaching (Bus.) US-93 in Twin Falls. The stretch of US-93 through downtown Twin Falls was designated as Bus. US-93 when the main route was re-routed to the north and west of town. There is still plenty of old signage in town without the Business banner.

item.title: US-30 West/Bus. US-93 South - To US-93
item.description: US-30 West/Bus. US-93 South - To US-93 on Addison Ave. in Twin Falls.

item.title: US-93 North at US-30/Bus. US-93
item.description: US-93 North at US-30/Bus. US-93 in Twin Falls County. Merge right for Bus. US-93 North/US-30 East to Twin Falls City Center. Continue under overpass for US-93 north to Twin Falls and Sun Valley and for US-30 west to Filer. US-30 is part of the Thousand Springs Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-93 South at Bus. US-93 in Twin Falls
item.description: US-93 South (Blue Lakes Blvd.) at Bus. US-93. Turn right on Pole Line Road to continue south on US-93. Continue straight on Blue Lakes Blvd. for Bus. US-93. US-93 was recently re-routed through Twin Falls along a bypass. Bus. US-93 follows the old route through Twin Falls.
